entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening and 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
